verses.verse: אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> He תּ֭וֹכָחוֹת <S%H8433><s%> that being often reproved מַקְשֶׁה־ <S%H7185><s%> hardeneth עֹ֑רֶף <S%H6203><s%> [his] neck פֶּ֥תַע <S%H6621><s%> shall suddenly יִ֝שָּׁבֵ֗ר <S%H7665><s%> be destroyed וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> beyond מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <S%H4832><s%> and that without remedy

בִּרְב֣וֹת <S%H7235><s%> are in authority צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> When the righteous יִשְׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> rejoice הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וּבִמְשֹׁ֥ל <S%H4910><s%> beareth rule רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> but when the wicked יֵאָ֥נַֽח <S%H584><s%> mourn עָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people

אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> Whoso אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> loveth חָ֭כְמָה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom יְשַׂמַּ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> rejoiceth אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְרֹעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> but he that keepeth company ז֝וֹנ֗וֹת <S%H2181><s%> with harlots יְאַבֶּד־ <S%H6><s%> spendeth הֽוֹן׃ <S%H1952><s%> [his] substance

מֶ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king בְּ֭מִשְׁפָּט <S%H4941><s%> by judgment יַעֲמִ֣יד <S%H5975><s%> establisheth אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> but he תְּרוּמ֣וֹת <S%H8641><s%> that receiveth gifts יֶֽהֶרְסֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H2040><s%> overthroweth

גֶּ֭בֶר <S%H1397><s%> A man מַחֲלִ֣יק <S%H2505><s%> that flattereth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour רֶ֝֗שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> a net פּוֹרֵ֥שׂ <S%H6566><s%> spreadeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for פְּעָמָֽיו׃ <S%H6471><s%> for his feet

בְּפֶ֤שַֽׁע <S%H6588><s%> In the transgression אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man רָ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> of an evil מוֹקֵ֑שׁ <S%H4170><s%> [there is] a snare וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> but the righteous יָר֥וּן <S%H7442><s%> doth sing וְשָׂמֵֽחַ׃ <S%H8055><s%> and rejoices

יֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> considereth צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> The righteous דִּ֣ין <S%H1779><s%> the cause דַּלִּ֑ים <S%H1800><s%> of the poor רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> [but] the wicked לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָבִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> regardeth דָּֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> not to know

אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> he לָ֭צוֹן <S%H3944><s%> Scornful יָפִ֣יחוּ <S%H6315><s%> into a snare קִרְיָ֑ה <S%H7151><s%> a city וַ֝חֲכָמִ֗ים <S%H2450><s%> but wise יָשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> [men] turn away אָֽף׃ <S%H639><s%> wrath

אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man חָכָ֗ם <S%H2450><s%> [If] a wise נִ֭שְׁפָּט <S%H8199><s%> contendeth אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֱוִ֑יל <S%H191><s%> with a foolish וְרָגַ֥ז <S%H7264><s%> whether he rage וְ֝שָׂחַ֗ק <S%H7832><s%> or laugh וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there נָֽחַת׃ <S%H5183><s%> [there is] no rest

אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> another דָ֭מִים <S%H1818><s%> of bloodshed יִשְׂנְאוּ־ <S%H8130><s%> hate תָ֑ם <S%H8535><s%> the upright וִֽ֝ישָׁרִ֗ים <S%H3477><s%> but the just יְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1245><s%> seek נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> his soul

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner ר֭וּחוֹ <S%H7307><s%> all his mind יוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> uttereth כְסִ֑יל <S%H3684><s%> A fool וְ֝חָכָ֗ם <S%H2450><s%> but a wise בְּאָח֥וֹר <S%H268><s%> it in till afterwards יְשַׁבְּחֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7623><s%> [man] keepeth

מֹ֭שֵׁל <S%H4910><s%> If a ruler מַקְשִׁ֣יב <S%H7181><s%> hearken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> act שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> to falsehood כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מְשָׁרְתָ֥יו <S%H8334><s%> all his servants רְשָׁעִֽים׃ <S%H7563><s%> [are] wicked

רָ֤שׁ <S%H7326><s%> The poor וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man תְּכָכִ֣ים <S%H8501><s%> and the deceitful נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H6298><s%> meet together מֵ֤אִיר־ <S%H215><s%> lighteneth עֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> their eyes שְׁנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H8147><s%> both יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king שׁוֹפֵ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> judgeth בֶּֽאֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> that faithfully דַּלִּ֑ים <S%H1800><s%> the poor כִּ֝סְא֗וֹ <S%H3678><s%> his throne לָעַ֥ד <S%H5703><s%> for ever יִכּֽוֹן׃ <S%H3559><s%> shall be established

שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> The rod וְ֭תוֹכַחַת <S%H8433><s%> and reproof יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> give חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וְנַ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> but a child מְ֝שֻׁלָּ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> left מֵבִ֥ישׁ <S%H954><s%> to shame אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> [to himself] bringeth his mother

בִּרְב֣וֹת <S%H7235><s%> are multiplied רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> When the wicked יִרְבֶּה־ <S%H7235><s%> increaseth פָּ֑שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> transgression וְ֝צַדִּיקִ֗ים <S%H6662><s%> but the righteous בְּֽמַפַּלְתָּ֥ם <S%H4658><s%> their fall יִרְאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> shall see

יַסֵּ֣ר <S%H3256><s%> Correct בִּ֭נְךָ <S%H1121><s%> thy son וִֽינִיחֶ֑ךָ <S%H5117><s%> and he shall give thee rest וְיִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> yea he shall give מַעֲדַנִּ֣ים <S%H4574><s%> delight לְנַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> unto thy soul פ

בְּאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there חָ֭זוֹן <S%H2377><s%> Where [there is] no vision יִפָּ֣רַֽע <S%H6544><s%> perish עָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וְשֹׁמֵ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> but he that keepeth תּוֹרָ֣ה <S%H8451><s%> the law אַשְׁרֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H835><s%> happy

בִּ֭דְבָרִים <S%H1697><s%> by words לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִוָּ֣סֶר <S%H3256><s%> will not be corrected עָ֑בֶד <S%H5650><s%> A servant כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָ֝בִ֗ין <S%H995><s%> for though he understand וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there מַעֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4617><s%> he will not answer

חָזִ֗יתָ <S%H2372><s%> Seest אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> thou a man אָ֣ץ <S%H213><s%> [that is] hasty בִּדְבָרָ֑יו <S%H1697><s%> act תִּקְוָ֖ה <S%H8615><s%> hope לִכְסִ֣יל <S%H3684><s%> of a fool מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> than

מְפַנֵּ֣ק <S%H6445><s%> He that delicately bringeth up מִנֹּ֣עַר <S%H5290><s%> from a child עַבְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant וְ֝אַחֲרִית֗וֹ <S%H319><s%> at the length יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> to be a מָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H4497><s%> shall have him become [his] son

אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man אַ֭ף <S%H639><s%> An angry יְגָרֶ֣ה <S%H1624><s%> stirreth up מָד֑וֹן <S%H4066><s%> strife וּבַ֖עַל <S%H1167><s%> man חֵמָ֣ה <S%H2534><s%> and a furious רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> aboundeth in פָּֽשַׁע׃ <S%H6588><s%> transgression

גַּאֲוַ֣ת <S%H1346><s%> pride אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> A man's תַּשְׁפִּילֶ֑נּוּ <S%H8213><s%> shall bring him low וּשְׁפַל־ <S%H8217><s%> the humble ר֝֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> in spirit יִתְמֹ֥ךְ <S%H8551><s%> shall uphold כָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> but honour

חוֹלֵ֣ק <S%H2505><s%> Whoso is partner עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with גַּ֭נָּב <S%H1590><s%> with a thief שׂוֹנֵ֣א <S%H8130><s%> hateth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his own soul אָלָ֥ה <S%H423><s%> cursing יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> he heareth וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nothing יַגִּֽיד׃ <S%H5046><s%> and bewrayeth

חֶרְדַּ֣ת <S%H2731><s%> The fear אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> of man יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> bringeth מוֹקֵ֑שׁ <S%H4170><s%> a snare וּבוֹטֵ֖חַ <S%H982><s%> but whoso putteth his trust בַּיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD יְשֻׂגָּֽב׃ <S%H7682><s%> shall be safe

רַ֭בִּים <S%H7227><s%> Many מְבַקְשִׁ֣ים <S%H1245><s%> seek פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> favour מוֹשֵׁ֑ל <S%H4910><s%> the ruler's וּ֝מֵיְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> [cometh] from the LORD מִשְׁפַּט־ <S%H4941><s%> judgment אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> but [every] man's

תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <S%H8441><s%> [is] an abomination צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> to the just אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man עָ֑וֶל <S%H5766><s%> An unjust וְתוֹעֲבַ֖ת <S%H8441><s%> [is] abomination רָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> to the wicked יְשַׁר־ <S%H3477><s%> and [he that is] upright דָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> in the way פ
